/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. Cars and buses are scattered throughout the scene, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, with shadows subtly hinting at the time of day.
